title: Team Recruiting Top & Adc
body:
Looking for people Gold +, main Top or Adc 
Add me in game or reply to this post if interested. 
Notes, we are a low to mid plat team and looking for only Top or Adc main player. Aiming for the ranked team rewards 
We recruit any gold players as long as you listen and cooperate with the team. 

Please use this format if you are going to reply here, thanks.

In-game name: <<Your In game Name>>
Role: <<Your Role>>
Champs: <<Your Pref Champs>>
Current Rank: <<Your Current Rank>>
Verbal Communication: <<Unnecessary for the Pre 5 games>>

Thanks for your time.

Sorry for my bad English (Not my first language)

replies.body:
In-game name: Naranjak
Role: Mainly Mid but i also ADC a bit.
Champs: Annie, Azir, Zed, Kalista, Jinx.
Current Rank: Gold 5
Verbal Communication: Mainly Skype but I also have teamspeak.

In-game name: Etrite
Role: Top/ADC/Mid
Champs: Too many to list. Can change according to team's preferences
Current Rank: Plat 5
Verbal Communication: Any format is fine with me

In-game name: bapitixo
Role: adc/support
Champs: Vayne, Corki, Jinx, Kalista, Tristana (relevant champs)
Current Rank: Gold 3 
Verbal Communication: Rammus says "ok" (have mic and skype/ts/axon)

Hey my ign is Frost09 I'm currently silver 3 however I guarantee I will be gold by the end of this week. I have been away in Japan and am eager to get back. My main role is adc I play Jinx, Graves and sivir. I feel as if I'm at a mid gold in terms of skill level but work even better when it comes to working with a team. I'm eager to learn, positive and friendly. And if you just give me one chance I'll show you I'm worthy of being on your team, Kind Regards, Zak
